lore: Although by law only the most dangerous criminals are sent to the Torture Chamber, the roof has begun to collapse in some places, producing holes through which innocent people sometimes fall or are pushed by gangs of criminals.\n\nIf one does not emerge unscathed from a fight against the Lurid Masochist, serious measures must be taken for several nights. The poison of its katars apparently causes the victims to harm themselves while they sleep.
menagerieDialog: (It's casually whittling away at its arm with a knife.)
(It keeps scraping its katars together. In other words, it's making the most annoying noise in the world.)
(It never seems to stop hurting itself. Fortunately, your kingdom's healers are some of the best in all of Rodia.)
(This creature takes a sickening amount of pleasure in being wounded.)
(This creature never eats or sleeps. How it survives is a mystery to even your most astute scholars.)
name: Lurid Masochist
